Ồ…

vi: Sofia,

vi: "Ta có thể yêu thương chúng,

vi:
nhưng đừng có áp đặt".
 "Bạn có thể cố gắng để giống con,

vi: nhưng đừng bắt chúng giống bạn".

Ước gì tôi có thể cãi lại.

Why did you want a boy?

Because I don't think that I can have
 the classic mother-daughter relationship with this child.

Vì tôi không nghĩ tôi có thể có
 mối quan hệ mẹ con như bình thường với nó.

To tell you the truth, I feel sorry for those women
 that are in constant need for help, for support.

Let me put it differently.
 I'm not the first and won't be the last woman to give birth.

pa: Are you sure, Spyros?

What do you think happened?

We've gotta be realistic here.
 I can't believe that all this has happened.

Thực tế đi nào.
 Không ngờ lại xảy ra vụ này.

pa: Orestis?

They're trafficking.
 Laundering money.

Rửa tiền.

I knew he was drinking.

I knew everything.
 I only let him work for me so he could get some extra cash.

vi: Anh sẽ không báo cảnh sát,

en: Ούτε θα φέρω σε δύσκολη θέση τον γιο σου.

pa: Fanis, or anyone in your family.
Thank you.

pa: He's good for me.

pa: I have to go.

pa: How is she?

pa:
Aren't we friends?
 Do you want them to get suspicious?

pa: It'll pass.

pa: Seriously, I'm unwell.

pa: Spyros, I'm unwell.

pa: Antonis…

pa: I don't want anything to do with you.

en: Θέλω να ασχοληθώ με τη ζωή μου.

en: Θα έχω μια ήρεμη ζωή μαζί της. Αυτό θέλω.

pa:
Get out.
 Leave.

pa: And please, don't come back anymore.

pa: Come on, get out!

pa: Take care.

en: Αγάπη μου, σε παίρνω και δεν απαντάς. Ελπίζω να ακούσεις το μήνυμα.

Honey, where are you?
 I've tried calling you, but you don't answer.

I hope you'll get this message.
 I'm with the therapist, waiting for you. She only has time to meet with us now.

pa: Is there a protest happening today?

pa: He fell in love.
vi: Anh ấy đã yêu.

pa: It's human. It happens.
vi: Bình thường thôi.

pa: A 19-year-old.
vi: Yêu một cô bé 19 tuổi. Chị thấy đấy…

pa: You understand.
Is that why you came back?
vi: Vì thế hai người quay về à?

en: Όταν ένας μεσήλικας ερωτεύεται κάποια που θα μπορούσε να 'ναι κόρη του,
pa:
When a middle-aged man falls in love
 with a girl who could have been his daughter,
vi:
Đàn ông trung niên
 đi yêu một cô đáng tuổi con gái thì chả đi đến đâu, nhỉ?

en: τα πράγματα είναι κάπως αδιέξοδα. Έτσι δεν είναι;

So their relationship is over?
vi: - Vậy họ đã chấm dứt quan hệ. - Thì còn thế nào được nữa?

pa: What did you expect?

Έχω πολύ πιο σοβαρά να διαχειριστώ.

It's a present I wanted him to have
 for everything he did for all of us on the island.

pa:
Who?
 Orestis.
vi:
Ai cơ ạ?
 Orestis.

It's a pair of glasses that he really liked,
 and he was gonna drop by to pick them up.

-What? -Nothing, but…

pa: Ah…

vi: - Không sao. - Chị dở quá.

vi: - Chào chị Irini. - Nếu em cần gì,

pa:
Sure, bye.
 And, hey.

Dạ, chào chị.
 Này, tóc em đẹp đấy.

Thank you.

Dad's not home yet?

Προέχει να ασχοληθεί κανείς μαζί του.

-What's his problem? -Ask him yourself.

I'm doing great!

vi: Được rồi, con hơi thất vọng

I'll pursue my studies in Athens,

♪ Και μόνο που με κοιτάς λιώνω ♪
♪ Και μόνο που με κοιτάς λιώνω ♪

Perfect.
 Per, per, per, per, per, per, per, per, perfect!

It helps with the pain, y'know?
 Of course, I don't know if the one they gave me is actually medicinal.

But who cares?
 What happened, and why is everyone acting this way?

pa:
to resolving our issues.
 For example, in your case, your hair took the fall.

-Not at all. -I don't give a fuck.

-You're full of crap. -What did you say?
 I said what I said. Bite me!

Can I go now?
 No, you can't.

Cháu đi được chưa?

en: ♪ Και μόνο που με κοιτάς λιώνω ♪

DIONISIS FAFALIOS
 Meet Dionisis.

He didn't pass my entrance exam for the conservatory.
vi: Ông đánh trượt bà ở Nhạc viện, bà về trong đau khổ.

pa: I came back completely heartbroken.

en: Δύο χρόνια μετά χώρισε τη γυναίκα του

vi: Hai năm sau ông ly dị vợ

vi: Ông ở lại một mình trên đảo

pa: I never got over him.

en: Ήταν οι γονείς σου μπλεγμένοι σε παρανομίες;

pa: No.

pa: Yes.

pa: Did you feel sorry for your mother?

pa: No.

I'm really frustrated that I can't bring myself to ask
 about what's happening in my own house.

You've destroyed any romantic notions
 I may have had about you and Grandpa, you know?

If you weren't such a complete and utter moron,
 you'd have understood exactly what I mean, Orestis.
vi: Nếu anh không đại ngu đại ngốc, anh sẽ hiểu ý em.

en: Δεν με παίρνει να μπλέξω άλλο αν πάει κάτι στραβά.
pa: I can't afford to get in any more trouble, in case something goes wrong.
vi: Em không thể dính vào rắc rối thêm nữa.

en: Και δεν θα σε καλύψω ξανά.
pa: Because I won't cover for you again.
vi: Em sẽ không bao che cho anh nữa.

en: Δεν θέλω να 'χουμε καμία σχέση μ' αυτό το γαμώνησο.
pa: We want no part of that fucking island, that's for sure.
vi: Em chả muốn dính tới hòn đảo chết tiệt đó.

pa: If she comes, make sure she fails.
vi: Đánh trượt cô ấy đi.

pa: Yes, ma'am.
vi: Tuân lệnh.

en: Σε αφορά καθόλου ότι σε λίγο καιρό θα έχουμε παιδί;
pa: Do you care at all about the fact that soon we'll have a baby together?

pa: Would I be here if I didn't?
vi: Có, nên tôi mới ở đây chứ.

pa: That's what I wanted to hear.
vi: Vậy rõ ràng rồi.

en: Τι αυγά πετάξανε χθες το βράδυ;
pa: What's with those eggs they threw last night?

pa: What eggs?
vi: Trứng gì?

en: Κάποιος πέταξε αυγά στην πόρτα του σπιτιού.
pa: Someone threw some eggs at our front door.
vi: - Ai đó đã ném trứng vào cửa. - Tôi không biết.

pa: I have no idea.
I'm not coming to the concert.
vi: Em không xem hòa nhạc đâu.

pa: Being two months old,
vi: Mới được hai tháng tuổi,

en: Δεν ξέρουν πόσο επικίνδυνος είναι ο κόσμος τους.
pa: they have no idea how dangerous their world is.
vi: chúng không biết thế giới nguy hiểm thế nào.

en: Λεοπαρδάλεις και ύαινες σκοτώνουν συχνά μικρά.
pa: Leopards and hyenas are well-known cub killers.
vi: Báo đốm và linh cẩu nổi tiếng vì săn thú con.

en: Πάνω απ' τα μισά λιονταράκια δεν φτάνουν τον έναν χρόνο ζωής.
pa: More than half of lion cubs never see their first birthday.
vi: Hơn một nửa số sư tử con không qua nổi sinh nhật đầu tiên.

pa: And even fewer make it to adulthood.
vi: Số sống tới tuổi trưởng thành còn ít hơn.

pa: But the biggest threat of all… is from other lions.
vi: Nhưng mối đe dọa lớn nhất là từ những con sư tử khác.

pa: Their mother is on edge.

en: που δεν είναι ο δικός σου.

I wasted all these years.

en: Ο μεγαλύτερός μου φόβος, όμως, ήταν πάντα μη μείνω μόνη μου.
pa: I said that my biggest fear was to be alone.
vi: Tuy nhiên, nỗi sợ lớn nhất của tôi là luôn bị cô đơn.

en: Αλλά τελικά μάλλον ήμουν πιο μόνη απ' όσο φοβόμουνα.
pa: But as it turns out, I was always alone.
vi: Nhưng sau tất cả, có lẽ tôi còn cô đơn hơn mức tôi sợ.

pa: And my worst mistakes were the result of my crippling fear.

pa:
And I'm still paying for it.

en: Δεν είναι πια στο χέρι σου.
pa: Demosthenes, it's out of your hands now.
vi: Demosthenes, ngoài khả năng của anh rồi.

en: Σύνταξη δεν περίμενες τόσα χρόνια; Την πήρες.
pa: Didn't you look forward to your retirement all these years?
vi: Anh không mong được nghỉ hưu à? Sao không nghỉ ngơi đi?

pa: You're done now. Why can't you just relax?

en: Γιατί ο τύπος έχει φάει δύο σφαίρες. Τον φάγανε, είναι ξεκάθαρο.
pa: Because that guy was shot two times.

 Why don't you look into it?

Rõ ràng là ông ta bị giết.
 Sao không điều tra đi?

pa: He's been missing all these months from Paxos.

en: Φέρε τον. Αυτό που έκανες είναι παράνομο.
pa: Give me that file. What you did is illegal.
vi:
Đưa tôi hồ sơ.
 Anh làm thế là phạm pháp.

en: Ο πρώτος χασισέμπορος είναι ή ο τελευταίος; Τι σε νοιάζει;
pa: He's not the first pot dealer, nor is he the last.
vi: Hắn đâu phải kẻ duy nhất buôn ma túy. Anh để ý làm gì?

en: Έχω πολύ πιο σημαντικές υποθέσεις να ασχοληθώ.
pa:
Why do you care?
 Listen, I've got more important cases to deal with. Come on.
vi: Tôi còn phải giải quyết nhiều vụ quan trọng hơn.

en: Ωραία. Μπορώ να το αναλάβω εγώ. Διακριτικά θα το κάνω.
pa: Fine. I can look into it on my own. I'll be very discreet.
vi: Được rồi, tôi có thể tự điều tra. Tôi sẽ làm kín đáo.

pa: Why can't you just sit tight and relax?
vi: Sao anh không nghỉ ngơi đi?

en: Αν μου ξαναπείς να ξεκουραστώ, μα την Παναγία, θα φας μπούφλες.
pa: If you tell me one more time to sit and relax, I swear to God,
vi: Anh còn bảo tôi nghỉ ngơi nữa, thề có Chúa, tôi sẽ đánh anh.

pa:
I'll kick you in the ass.
 Go to hell. Fuck you, you little shit!
vi: Biến đi! Đồ khốn nạn!

en: Μ' εμένα έμαθες. Μου το χρωστάς.
pa: I taught you everything. You owe me, asshole.

pa: You weren't here.
